title: Science Centre Singapore
blurb: Scientific institution promoting science education.
description: The Science Centre Singapore is dedicated to promoting scientific and technological education for the general public. Located in Jurong East, it offers a variety of exhibitions, activities, and workshops designed to engage visitors of all ages. Explore interactive exhibits, watch science shows and demonstrations, and participate in competitions. The centre also features KidsSTOP™ for younger children, the Omni-Theatre, and Snow City. Perfect for families and school groups looking for an educational and fun experience. Discover the wonders of science through hands-on learning and exploration.

title: Science Centre Singapore: Explore & Discover!
blurb: Explore exhibitions, activities, and shows for all ages.
description: Science Centre Singapore offers a variety of engaging and educational experiences for families and children. Explore interactive exhibitions covering diverse scientific topics, from dinosaurs to the human body. Enjoy live science shows and demonstrations that bring science to life. Participate in hands-on activities and workshops designed to spark curiosity and foster a love of learning. With dedicated spaces like KidsSTOP™ for younger children and specialized programs for schools, there's something for everyone at Science Centre Singapore. Perfect for a family day out, the centre provides a fun and informative environment where kids can learn through play and discovery. The centre aims to promote STEM education and inspire the next generation of scientists and innovators.
datetime_display: Refer to website for operating hours
Keyword_tag: Science, exhibitions, activities, shows, workshops, kids, family, learning, education, STEM

title: KidsSTOP™: A World of Science for Young Ones
blurb: Interactive exhibits designed for children aged 18 months+
description: KidsSTOP™ is a dedicated children's science centre designed to engage and educate young learners through play. With interactive exhibits and hands-on activities, children can explore various scientific concepts in a fun and stimulating environment. From building structures to conducting experiments, KidsSTOP™ offers a range of experiences that encourage curiosity and foster a love of learning. Perfect for families with young children, KidsSTOP™ provides a safe and engaging space where kids can discover the wonders of science through play. The centre aims to promote early childhood STEM education and inspire the next generation of scientists and innovators. Exhibits are tailored to different age groups, ensuring that every child can find something to enjoy and learn from.
datetime_display: Refer to website for operating hours
Keyword_tag: Kids, science, interactive exhibits, play, learning, education, STEM

title: Omni-Theatre: Immersive Dome Screen Experience
blurb: Experience movies and shows on a large format dome screen.
description: The Omni-Theatre at Science Centre Singapore offers a unique and immersive cinematic experience. Featuring a large format dome screen and state-of-the-art projection technology, the theatre transports audiences to different worlds and perspectives. From educational documentaries to thrilling adventures, the Omni-Theatre showcases a variety of films that cater to different interests and age groups. Perfect for families and movie enthusiasts, the Omni-Theatre provides a captivating and informative entertainment experience. The theatre aims to enhance learning through visual storytelling and inspire a sense of wonder about the world around us. With comfortable seating and a stunning visual display, the Omni-Theatre is a must-visit attraction at Science Centre Singapore.
Keyword_tag: Movies, dome screen, theatre, films, education, entertainment, family

title: Snow City: Singapore's First Permanent Snow Centre
blurb: Experience real snow and winter activities in Singapore.
description: Snow City is Singapore's first permanent snow centre, offering a unique and exciting winter experience in the heart of the tropics. With real snow and a variety of winter activities, visitors can enjoy sledding, snowboarding, and snow play all year round. Perfect for families and thrill-seekers, Snow City provides a fun and refreshing escape from the heat. The centre features a snow playground, ice sculptures, and interactive exhibits that showcase the science of snow and ice. Snow City aims to promote winter sports and activities in Singapore and provide a memorable experience for visitors of all ages. With a range of attractions and activities, Snow City is a must-visit destination for those looking for a cool and exciting adventure.
datetime_display: Refer to website for operating hours
Keyword_tag: Snow, winter, activities, sledding, snowboarding, ice sculptures, family

title: Science Centre Singapore Prehistoric Exhibition
blurb: Explore prehistoric giants and mass extinctions!
description: Embark on an extraordinary journey through 400 million years of Earth’s history at Science Centre Singapore. This bold new exhibition features the awe-inspiring Patagotitan mayorum, a true titan of the dinosaur world. Stand beneath a colossal 40-metre dinosaur cast and feel dwarfed by its prehistoric majesty. The Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum of the National University of Singapore are bringing together two world-renowned exhibitions— Dinosaurs of Patagonia and Six Extinctions — for the first time. With 33 rare fossils and 60 full-scale models, this largest ever dinosaur showcase will unfold across three interactive zones, to reveal the dramatic rise and fall of prehistoric life and the five major mass extinction events that have shaped our planet.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, Extinctions, Prehistoric, Fossils, Science, Museum, Exhibition, Family-friendly

title: Dinosaurs of Patagonia & Six Extinctions Exhibition
blurb: Explore dinosaurs and Earth's greatest upheavals.
description: Step into ancient Patagonia and discover 13 extraordinary dinosaur species, including the colossal Patagotitan mayorum. See a breathtaking full-scale cast of dinosaurs that weighed around 70 tonnes. Journey through Earth's most catastrophic moments at Gondwana Studios’ Six Extinctions, featuring over 30 displays that chronicle nature's greatest upheavals. Come face-to-face with “Scotty”, the largest Tyrannosaurus rex ever found, before confronting the sixth mass extinction. This powerful finale challenges guests to grapple with humanity's impact on Earth's vanishing biodiversity. Perfect for families and dinosaur enthusiasts.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, Patagonia, Extinctions, Science, Museum, Family, Kids, Exhibition
full_address: Dinosaurs of Patagonia & Six Extinctions Exhibition

title: Dinosaurs Extinctions US at Science Centre
blurb: Explore Singapore’s biodiversity challenges and extinction.
description: An innovative collaboration between Science Centre Singapore and Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum, featuring over 90 remarkable artefacts including rare fossils and full-scale models. The exhibition highlights Singapore’s biodiversity challenges, featuring specimens like the cream-coloured giant squirrel and the rufous-collared kingfisher, both now nationally extinct. Cutting-edge scientific methods and analytical tools being employed to study extinction records that will help predict and prevent loss of more species in the future. The experience lasts about 60 -90 minutes and is suitable for children 5 years and above.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, Extinction, Fossils, Science, Museum, Exhibition, Children, Family

title: DINOSAURS | EXTINCTIONS | US Exhibition
organiser: Science Centre Singapore and Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum
blurb: Innovative collaboration featuring over 90 artefacts.
description: DINOSAURS | EXTINCTIONS | US is an innovative collaboration between Science Centre Singapore and Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum, featuring over 90 remarkable artefacts including rare fossils and full-scale models. Explore the wonders of prehistoric life and learn about the factors that led to the extinction of dinosaurs. This exhibition offers an engaging and educational experience for families and children of all ages. Discover fascinating facts about dinosaurs, their habitats, and the science behind their extinction. Interactive displays and exhibits make learning fun and accessible for everyone. Perfect for a family outing.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, Extinctions, Fossils, Science, Museum, Exhibition, Family, Kids

title: Dinosaurs: Extinction is Forever at Science Centre
blurb: Embark on a journey through time and discover dinosaurs.
description: Step into a world where colossal creatures roamed the Earth at the Dinosaurs: Extinction is Forever exhibition. This immersive experience brings you face-to-face with life-sized dinosaur animatronics, fossil replicas, and interactive displays that reveal the science behind their reign and ultimate extinction. Perfect for families and dinosaur enthusiasts of all ages, this exhibition offers a thrilling and educational adventure. Explore the mysteries of the past, uncover the latest scientific discoveries, and ponder the future of our planet. The experience lasts about 60 - 90 minutes, depending on the individual visitor.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, Extinction, Science Centre, Exhibition, Fossils, Interactive Displays, Family-friendly, Educational Adventure

title: Dinosaurs: Extinction
blurb: Suitable for children 5 years and above.
description: The Dinosaurs: Extinction exhibition at the Science Centre Singapore offers an engaging and educational experience for families and children aged 5 and above. This exhibition explores the fascinating world of dinosaurs and the factors that led to their extinction. Visitors can expect to see life-sized dinosaur models, interactive displays, and informative exhibits that delve into the science behind dinosaur extinction. The exhibition is designed to be family-friendly, with content that is accessible and engaging for children of various ages. Activities include hands-on exhibits, fossil digging, and educational videos.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, Extinction, Science Centre, Exhibition, Children, Family-friendly, Educational

title: Dinosaurs: Extinction is Not the End at Science Centre
blurb: Explore the Dinosaurs: Extinction is Not the End exhibit.
description: The Dinosaurs: Extinction is Not the End exhibit is accessible for people with reduced mobility, with certain conditions. The experience is outfitted with ramps, and all entrances and exits are designed with a wide enough space for manual wheelchairs, canes, walkers, or alternative manual mobility devices. Please note the space is not suitable for motorised wheelchairs. Explore the wonders of dinosaurs and their world in this family-friendly exhibit. Discover the science behind extinction events and the resilience of life on Earth. Perfect for families and dinosaur enthusiasts of all ages.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, Extinction, Science, Exhibit, Family-friendly, Mobility access

title: Science Centre Singapore - Dinosaurs Exhibition
blurb: Explore dinosaurs and extinctions at Science Centre.
description: Located at the Annexe, Science Centre Singapore, the Dinosaurs Exhibition offers an immersive experience into the world of dinosaurs and the science behind extinctions. The exhibition provides parking facilities, locker rentals, and accessible toilets. Email specialprojects@science.edu.sg for more information about the event and organizers. Discover the wonders of prehistoric life and learn about the factors that led to their disappearance in this family-friendly exhibition. Perfect for kids and adults alike, this educational experience combines fun with learning.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, Extinction, Science Centre, Exhibition, Family-friendly, Educational

title: Science Centre Singapore Parking Facilities
blurb: Parking available for guests at Science Centre.
description: Science Centre Singapore offers parking facilities for its guests. Information on parking charges is available. The Science Centre is dedicated to promoting science and technology education for visitors of all ages, with interactive exhibits and educational programs. It aims to inspire and engage the community in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM). The centre features a variety of exhibits, including those on climate change, human biology, and space exploration. It also hosts workshops, shows, and events throughout the year, making it a great destination for families and school groups. The parking facilities ensure convenient access for all visitors.
Keyword_tag: Parking, Science Centre, Facilities, Guests

title: Science Centre Singapore Locker Rentals
blurb: Convenient locker rentals available on-site for visitors.
description: Science Centre Singapore offers convenient locker rentals located throughout the centre. These lockers provide a secure place for visitors to store their belongings while they explore the exhibits and attractions. This service enhances the overall experience by allowing guests to move freely and comfortably without the burden of carrying bags or personal items. The lockers are easily accessible and provide a practical solution for storing coats, backpacks, and other items, ensuring a more enjoyable and hassle-free visit for families and individuals alike. Perfect for families with young children.
Keyword_tag: Locker rental, storage, Science Centre Singapore, family-friendly, convenience

title: Dinosaurs Extinction Venue at Science Centre
blurb: Explore the Dinosaurs Extinction venue and exhibits.

Explore various exhibits showcasing dinosaur fossils, interactive displays, and educational information about prehistoric life. The venue is designed to be family-friendly, providing an engaging and informative experience for visitors of all ages. Discover the mysteries of the past and learn about the science behind dinosaur extinction through interactive exhibits and displays. Perfect for families and children interested in paleontology and natural history. The venue includes educational resources and hands-on activities to enhance the learning experience.

title: Science Centre Singapore Ticketing and Rescheduling
blurb: Reschedule ticket bookings with one month's notice.
description: Science Centre Singapore allows changes to the date or time of your experience, provided the request is made at least one month before the original scheduled date. All changes are subject to availability. To request a change, email ticketing@science.edu.sg with your ticket reference ID. This policy ensures flexibility for visitors while managing scheduling constraints.
